Description:
Key Job AccountabilitiesCollect technical data for the preparation of CMMS templates.
Develop equipment hierarchy for plants facilities as per client procedures.
Conduct regular data checks to ensure compliance with data structure and correct and complete formats with required level of history and report findings regularly.
Ensure CMMS database is updated with latest project documentation and relevant changes.
Ensure all equipment in the registry conforms to standardized numbering convention.
Complete quality check of all templates and load files to ensure compliance with client procedures.
Ensure future asset cost centres are captured in the database to allow Work Orders initiation.
Liaise regularly with end users to ensure effective use of CMMS system and its associated applications.Skills
Skills:
QualificationsBachelor’s Degree in Engineering or equivalent.
Knowledge and Key Skills6 years’ direct maintenance experience within the oil and gas industry including 3 years’ experience of SAP/CMMS data manipulation and analysis of maintenance history information.
Knowledge of SAP/CMMS for delivery solutions and Asset maintenance requirements.
Knowledge of maintenance techniques, tools, and processes.
